about.summary: A general purpose client to work with any 'OAI-PMH' (Open Archives Initiative Protocol for 'Metadata' Harvesting) service. The 'OAI-PMH' protocol is described at <http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/openarchivesprotocol.html>. Functions are provided to work with the 'OAI-PMH' verbs: 'GetRecord', 'Identify', 'ListIdentifiers', 'ListMetadataFormats', 'ListRecords', and 'ListSets'.

A general purpose client to work with any 'OAI-PMH' (Open Archives Initiative Protocol for 'Metadata' Harvesting) service. The 'OAI-PMH' protocol is described at <http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/openarchivesprotocol.html>. Functions are provided to work with the 'OAI-PMH' verbs: 'GetRecord', 'Identify', 'ListIdentifiers', 'ListMetadataFormats', 'ListRecords', and 'ListSets'.

name: r-oai
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "0.4.0" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-oai
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/oai_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/oai/oai_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: f540de066de5538e303cd535cbd2e771b40474bc2c6e8d08a4894a868543ee33

build:
  number: 3
  noarch: generic
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-httr >=1.2.0
    - r-plyr >=1.8.4
    - r-stringr >=1.1.0
    - r-tibble >=1.2
    - r-xml2 >=1.0.0
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-httr >=1.2.0
    - r-plyr >=1.8.4
    - r-stringr >=1.1.0
    - r-tibble >=1.2
    - r-xml2 >=1.0.0

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('oai')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('oai')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: https://github.com/ropensci/oai
  license: MIT
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/MIT
    - LICENSE
  summary: "A general purpose client to work with any 'OAI-PMH' (Open Archives Initiative Protocol for 'Metadata' Harvesting) service. The 'OAI-PMH' protocol is described at <http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/openarchivesprotocol.html>. Functions are provided to work with the 'OAI-PMH' verbs: 'GetRecord', 'Identify', 'ListIdentifiers',\
    \ 'ListMetadataFormats', 'ListRecords', and 'ListSets'."
  license_family: MIT

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r

# Package: oai
# Type: Package
# Title: General Purpose 'Oai-PMH' Services Client
# Description: A general purpose client to work with any 'OAI-PMH' (Open Archives Initiative Protocol for 'Metadata' Harvesting) service. The 'OAI-PMH' protocol is described at <http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/openarchivesprotocol.html>. Functions are provided to work with the 'OAI-PMH' verbs: 'GetRecord', 'Identify', 'ListIdentifiers', 'ListMetadataFormats', 'ListRecords', and 'ListSets'.
